original_title: In the Realm of Death & Dreaming
overview: Does consciousness continue after death, or is it lights out? Director Johanna Lunn guides viewers on a personal journey to find answers by exploring stories of near-death experiences, deathbed visions, and more. She speaks with leading clinicians and researchers who have spent their careers studying these experiences and the nature of consciousness. Their stories are revealed with humour and compassion.
title: In the Realm of Death & Dreaming
